participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Outspoken and confident, Jessica enjoys expressing her opinions openly. She is a social butterfly who loves to indulge in luxurious experiences.
participant_1.background: i like to tan in tanning beds. i love spending money. i am high maintenance. i diet a lot. i love listening to britney spears.

participant_2.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home.
